<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 11+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ring of Maniacal Devices](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3437)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=637" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 310 <sup>1.1</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This magic ring seems like simple tarnished brass, but it enhances your curiosity about traps and devices of all kinds. You can use an Interact action to pull a [thieves' toolkit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2758) from the ring. This toolkit appears in your hand and any part of it folds back into the ring if they would leave your possession. They grant you a +2 item bonus to Thievery checks to [Disable a Device](/Actions.aspx?ID=2411) and to [Pick a Lock](/Actions.aspx?ID=2412), and the ring's insights grant you the same bonus to Crafting checks to [Craft](/Actions.aspx?ID=2385) and [Repair](/Actions.aspx?ID=2384) snares and traps.

**Activate—Fireball Trap** <actions string="" /> 10 minutes ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You create the effects of a [_rune trap_](/Rituals.aspx?ID=124) ritual containing [_fireball_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1530). You can have only one trapped rune from a ring of maniacal devices active at a time, even if you have multiple rings, and the rune disappears if you lose your investiture in the ring.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

>
Ring of Maniacal Devices (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 310 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 614 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 21,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The ring grants a +3 bonus. Activating it creates a rune trap containing your choice of either a 7th-rank [_howling blizzard_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1559) or a 7th-rank [_fireball_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1530).
